criminals.reward: The Rewards For Justice Program, United States Department of State, is offering a reward of up to $5 million for information leading directly to the apprehension or conviction
The Rewards For Justice Program, United States Department of State, is offering a reward of up to $5 million for information leading directly to the apprehension or conviction

news.author: Guest Writer
news.title: Facebook’s Crypto Libra is a Huge Deal – Just Not for the Reason you Think
news.description: By CCN Markets: With the release of its whitepaper, Facebook officially announced its cryptocurrency, Libra. It now joins JP Morgan and Atletico Mineiro among the ranks of non-blockchain businesses with their own crypto. What does this mean for cryptocurrency…
